content: **knitted hooded scarf in drops air and drops brushed alpaca silk the piece is worked with stocking stitch garter stitch and i-cord sizes s - xl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #snowflakehood drops design pattern ai-523 yarn group c + c or e ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - l/xl fits head-size 54/56 - 58/60 cm length approx 45-46 cm width approx 178-180 cm **yarn** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-150 g colour 01 off white and use drops brushed alpaca silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 75-75 g colour 35 pearl grey **needles** drops circular needle size 8 mm length 80 cm **knitting gauge** 11 stitches in width and 15 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality on needle size 8 mm = 10 x 10 cm 11 stitches in width and 22 row in height with garter stitch and 1 strand of each quality on needle size 8 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size -------------------------------------------------------
